alert.note: Alert for Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:14PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ontonagon County through 245 PM EDT... At 214 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rockland, or 13 miles southeast of Ontonagon, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rockland around 230 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Mass City and Ontonagon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
